mapper.select: select rownum as rno, deposit_UID, fk_idx, depositcoin, deposit_status, deposit_type, deposit_date, fk_payment_UID from ( select deposit_UID, fk_idx, depositcoin, decode(deposit_status, 0, '사용완료', 1, '충전', 2, '차액환불', 3, '출금', -1, '입금대기') as deposit_status , deposit_type, to_char(deposit_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as deposit_date, fk_payment_UID from deposit where fk_idx = #{fk_idx} and depositcoin != 0 order by deposit_UID desc )
select reservation_date ,chart_UID ,decode(chart_type,'0','약국','1','일반 진료','2','예방접종','3','수술','4','호텔링') as chart_type ,totalpay,biz_name from chart where fk_idx = #{fk_idx}

insert into petcare(care_UID, fk_pet_UID, fk_caretype_UID, care_contents, care_memo, care_start, care_end, care_alarm, care_date) select seq_petcare_UID.nextval, A.* from(
select #{item.B} as fk_pet_UID, #{item.C} as fk_caretype_UID, #{item.D, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as care_contents , #{item.E} as care_memo, #{item.F} as care_start, #{item.G} as care_end, #{item.H} as care_alarm, to_char(to_date(#{item.G}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - #{item.H}*1/24/60, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as care_date from dual ) A
